import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Reports = () => { const [selectedPeriod, setSelectedPeriod] = useState('This Month'); const [showFilters, setShowFilters] = useState(false); const reportTypes = [ { id: 1, name: 'Profit & Loss', description: 'View income and expenses summary', icon: 'üìä', color: 'from-green-400 to-green-600', bgColor: 'bg-green-50', textColor: 'text-green-700' }, { id: 2, name: 'Balance Sheet', description: 'View assets, liabilities and equity', icon: '‚öñÔ∏è', color: 'from-blue-400 to-blue-600', bgColor: 'bg-blue-50', textColor: 'text-blue-700' }, { id: 3, name: 'Cash Flow', description: 'Track cash inflows and outflows', icon: 'üí∞', color: 'from-purple-400 to-purple-600', bgColor: 'bg-purple-50', textColor: 'text-purple-700' }, { id: 4, name: 'Trial Balance', description: 'View all account balances', icon: 'üìã', color: 'from-orange-400 to-orange-600', bgColor: 'bg-orange-50', textColor: 'text-orange-700' }, { id: 5, name: 'Tax Report', description: 'Generate tax-related reports', icon: 'üßæ', color: 'from-red-400 to-red-600', bgColor: 'bg-red-50', textColor: 'text-red-700' }, { id: 6, name: 'Custom Report', description: 'Create custom financial reports', icon: 'üîß', color: 'from-gray-400 to-gray-600', bgColor: 'bg-gray-50', textColor: 'text-gray-700' } ]; const recentReports = [ { id: 1, name: 'Profit & Loss - January 2024', date: '2024-01-15', type: 'P&L', size: '2.3 MB', status: 'Ready' }, { id: 2, name: 'Balance Sheet - December 2023', date: '2024-01-01', type: 'Balance', size: '1.8 MB', status: 'Ready' }, { id: 3, name: 'Cash Flow - Q4 2023', date: '2023-12-31', type: 'Cash Flow', size: '1.5 MB', status: 'Processing' }, { id: 4, name: 'Tax Report - FY 2023', date: '2023-12-28', type: 'Tax', size: '3.1 MB', status: 'Ready' } ]; const quickStats = [ { label: 'Total Reports Generated', value: '47', icon: 'üìà', change: '+12%' }, { label: 'This Month', value: '8', icon: 'üìÖ', change: '+25%' }, { label: 'Pending Reports', value: '2', icon: '‚è≥', change: '-50%' }, { label: 'Storage Used', value: '156 MB', icon: 'üíæ', change: '+8%' } ]; return (
{/* Header Section */}

Financial Reports

Generate comprehensive business reports and analytics

{/* Quick Stats */}
{quickStats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.label}

{stat.value}

{stat.change} from last month

{stat.icon}
))}
{/* Filters Section */} {showFilters && (
)} {/* Report Types Grid */}

Available Reports

{reportTypes.map((report) => (
{report.icon}

{report.name}

Last generated: 2 days ago

{report.description}

))}
{/* Recent Reports */}
{recentReports.map((report, index) => ( ))}
Report Details Type Generated Size Status Actions
{report.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}
{report.name}
Financial Report ‚Ä¢ PDF Format
 {report.type} {report.date} {report.size} {report.status}
); }; export default Reports;
